name: Car Racer (GrubGaming89)
description:
A more complex car game than my previous car game on Game jolt and I hope you enjoy it.

The game has:

3 regular levels and a sandbox level.

3 different ways that the car is coded, chose which one you like the most.

4 different car colors.

The game controls are:

"W A S D" for movement.

"Left shift" for faster Turning.

"R" to reset the car.

"Spacebar" (only works on the realistic car) is for breaking.

Have a nice day.
